Text: Mʼumi gba bʼo̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-mi te̩, O O̩jo̩-mi,
mʼumi gba bʼo̩wo̩ abo ku ma che uko̩lo̩ ibe̩te̩ te̩,
Todu, go, ma kpala jo̩anedeonugo-mi me̩;
ma fule amʼo̩la jo̩, ma li udu kʼu fe̩ n.
Uwe̩, O Jihofa O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.
Ama uwe̩, O Jihofa, anyʼuma anyi;
E̩ ki ko ma kpa n, tode̩gba kʼamone̩-mi agbenyo;
Ma te̩ agwʼalu ane̩ atene uje̩wñ,
